analysis: This update provides detailed information about a lease agreement for a property located at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut, including terms related to rent, security deposit, utilities, repairs, and other responsibilities.
instructions: Create a new property at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut
Set the lease start date for the property to 2024-07-01
Set the lease end date for the property to 2025-06-30
Set the monthly rent amount for the property to 2425
Set the total amount with pet fee for the property to 2475
Set the rent payment due date for the property to the 1st day of each calendar month
Set the initial rent payment commencement date for the property to 2024-06-24
Set the security deposit amount for the property to 2600
Set the conditions for return of the security deposit for the property
Assign the lessee responsibility for electric, internet, and cable services
Assign the lessor responsibility for water and sewer costs
Set the lessee responsibility for minor repairs up to 100
Set the lessor reimbursement policy for repairs over 250
Set the late fee for the property to 50 for any rent payment not paid by the due date with a grace period of 10 days
Allow the lessee to inspect the premises with the lessor before occupancy
Set occupancy terms to allow single-family residence by tenant and immediate family and invited guests, with no subletting or short-term rentals
Allow pets with a pet fee of 50 per month
Set maintenance responsibilities for the lessee to maintain the premises in good order and repair
Require the lessee to report any water leaks or malfunctions immediately
Require the lessee to obtain renter's insurance with coverage for personal property of at least 100000 and liability coverage of at least 250000
Set non-payment of rent as grounds for eviction
Require the lessee to provide written notice of termination at least 30 days in advance if choosing to terminate the lease early
Set the lessor name to Woodbridge Community Partners, LLC
Set the lessor email to Vadim.Tantsyura@outlook.com
Set the lessor phone number to 2032335859
Set additional terms for the lessee to keep the premises clean and sanitary, properly dispose of rubbish, and maintain smoke detectors
Provide three parking spaces as part of the leased premises
Set the alteration policy to require prior written consent from the lessor for any alterations to the premises
Set the governing law for the lease agreement to the laws of the State of Connecticut
